EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Iron Plate Production Line at y=0.0
Consists of four stone furnaces in a row with partial automation:
- Furnace at x=0.0 (contains coal, has 7 iron plates)
  - Has burner inserter at x=-1.5 y=0.5 for coal input
  - Has burner inserter at x=0.5 y=-1.5 for ore input
- Furnace at x=2.0 (contains coal, has 7 iron plates)
- Furnace at x=4.0 (contains coal, has 15 iron plates)
- Furnace at x=6.0 (contains coal, has 15 iron plates)

All furnaces are currently idle due to lack of ore input.

ERROR TIPS
### Resource availability errors
- Check inventory for required resources before attempting to insert items into entities
- Ensure you have both fuel (coal) and raw materials (ore) before setting up multiple furnaces
- Consider harvesting more resources when inventory is depleted instead of continuing to place empty structures

### Furnace efficiency
- Avoid placing furnaces without having resources ready to fuel and supply them
- Set up furnaces one at a time, ensuring each is properly supplied before moving to the next one
- When extracting products from furnaces, immediately resupply them with raw materials to maintain continuous production
- Monitor furnace warnings like 'no ingredients to smelt' and address them promptly to maintain production efficiency

### Inventory management
- Keep track of extracted items - logs show "Total iron plates collected: 0" despite extracting 44 plates
- Verify successful extraction operations by checking inventory contents before and after extraction

### Entity placement and retrieval errors
- Verify that an entity exists at a position before attempting to interact with it
- When trying to get an entity (like wooden chest), ensure it has been placed first
- Double check coordinates when attempting to interact with entities

### Automation setup
- When setting up automation, ensure all required components (chests, inserters, etc.) are placed before attempting to configure them
- Verify that inserters have proper pickup and drop positions that align with intended source and destination entities
